caller_intent: Jeff Edmonds is following up on a policy cancellation issue related to unpaid audit premiums, seeking clarification on invoices and steps to reinstate the policy.
resolution_steps: Tracy explains the history of two invoices (1435 and 1445) related to audit premiums and policy updates.
She clarifies that the 1445 invoice remains unpaid and triggered cancellation.
Outlines steps to reinstate the policy: obtain a signed statement of no loss (e-signed) and pay the 1445 invoice.
Agrees to send the statement of no loss via email for e-signature.
knowledge_required: Audit premium invoicing and carrier-specific procedures (Westfield)
Handling of e-signed documents for policy updates
systems_referenced: Westfield site (for policy management and invoicing)
E-signature platform for the statement of no loss
summary: Tracy resolves a policy cancellation issue by clarifying outstanding audit premium invoices and guiding Jeff through reinstatement steps, including obtaining an e-signed statement of no loss and paying the remaining balance. The client agrees to proceed with the e-signature process.
